00002 #include <QDebug>
00003 #include "connectionwrapper.h"

00005 ConnectionWrapper::ConnectionWrapper(QTcpSocket* socket, QObject* parent)
00006                   :QObject(parent), m_socket(socket), m_registered(false)
00007 {
00008     connect(m_socket, SIGNAL(disconnected()),
00009             this, SLOT(deleteLater()));
00010     connect(m_socket, SIGNAL(readyRead()),
00011             this, SLOT(incoming()));
00012     connect(socket, SIGNAL(stateChanged(QAbstractSocket::SocketState)),
00013             this, SLOT(stateChanged(QAbstractSocket::SocketState)));
00014 }
00015 
00016 void ConnectionWrapper::sendMessage(const QString& message)
00017 {
00018     m_socket->write(message.toUtf8());
00019     m_socket->write(QString("\n").toUtf8());
00020 }
00021 
00022 void ConnectionWrapper::incoming()
00023 {
00024     while (m_socket->canReadLine()) {
00025         QByteArray data = m_socket->readLine();
00026         QString line = QString::fromUtf8(data.data(), data.size());
00027         emit gotMessage(line);
00028     }
00029 }
00030 
00031 void ConnectionWrapper::stateChanged(QAbstractSocket::SocketState state)
00032 {
00033     if (state == QAbstractSocket::ClosingState) {
00034         deleteLater();
00035     }
00036 }
